headline.print_headline: APNewsBreak: Study Recommends Inmate Immunity Test
headline.main: APNewsBreak: Study Recommends Inmate Immunity Test

docs.snippet: Federal experts are recommending that California test inmates for immunity to a sometimes fatal soil-borne fungus before incarcerating them at two Central Valley state prisons where the disease has killed nearly three dozen inmates, according to a...
docs.lead_paragraph: Federal experts are recommending that California test inmates for immunity to a sometimes fatal soil-borne fungus before incarcerating them at two Central Valley state prisons where the disease has killed nearly three dozen inmates, according to a report obtained Friday by The Associated Press.

headline.main: At Goldman Sachs, the Right Candidate for a Half-Right Job

docs.snippet: The Wall Street firm has named Adebayo Ogunlesi to be the board’s new lead director. If only Goldman saw fit to call him chairman, writes Antony Currie of Reuters Breakingviews....
docs.abstract: The Wall Street firm has named Adebayo Ogunlesi to be the board’s new lead director. If only Goldman saw fit to call him chairman, writes Antony Currie of Reuters Breakingviews.

headline.print_headline: Fognini, Qualifier Cuevas in Croatia Open Last 4
headline.main: Fognini, Qualifier Cuevas in Croatia Open Last 4

docs.snippet: Top-seeded Fabio Fognini rallied to defeat Borna Coric of Croatia 5-7, 7-6 (4), 6-3 in the quarterfinals of the Croatia Open on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Fabio Fognini rallied to defeat Borna Coric of Croatia 5-7, 7-6 (4), 6-3 in the quarterfinals of the Croatia Open on Friday.

headline.print_headline: City Leaders Talk 2024 With US Olympic Committee
headline.main: City Leaders Talk 2024 With US Olympic Committee

docs.snippet: City leaders from Boston, Los Angeles, San Francisco and Washington met Friday with top executives at the U.S. Olympic Committee to hear about the nuts and bolts of bidding for the 2024 Olympics....
docs.lead_paragraph: City leaders from Boston, Los Angeles, San Francisco and Washington met Friday with top executives at the U.S. Olympic Committee to hear about the nuts and bolts of bidding for the 2024 Olympics.

headline.print_headline: Obama's UN Envoy Takes Lead Role in Plane Response
headline.main: Obama's UN Envoy Takes Lead Role in Plane Response

docs.snippet: One day after a passenger jet was shot out of the sky, Samantha Power took her seat at the United Nations Security Council and angrily began building the Obama administration's case against separatists in eastern Ukraine and their Russian benefact...
docs.lead_paragraph: One day after a passenger jet was shot out of the sky, Samantha Power took her seat at the United Nations Security Council and angrily began building the Obama administration's case against separatists in eastern Ukraine and their Russian benefactors.

headline.print_headline: Deterrence a Goal and Challenge at Texas Border
headline.main: Deterrence a Goal and Challenge at Texas Border

docs.snippet: Three heavily armed Texas patrol boats rounded a bend in the Rio Grande on a recent afternoon and came upon two young men paddling an inflatable raft full-speed ahead toward the Mexican shore. The state troopers and game wardens bobbed helplessly ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Three heavily armed Texas patrol boats rounded a bend in the Rio Grande on a recent afternoon and came upon two young men paddling an inflatable raft full-speed ahead toward the Mexican shore. The state troopers and game wardens bobbed helplessly in their boats as the men passed their raft and paddles up the bank to others, and a crew of troopers peeked through the tall reeds on the U.S. side for whatever load had just been deposited.

headline.print_headline: Limited Review Finds White House Political Office Was Within Law
headline.main: Limited Review Finds White House Political Office Was Within Law

docs.snippet: A limited review found the White House's political office appears to be operating within the law, a federal oversight agency said amid a congressional probe into whether taxpayer money has been used by the Obama administration for political purpos...
docs.lead_paragraph: A limited review found the White House's political office appears to be operating within the law, a federal oversight agency said amid a congressional probe into whether taxpayer money has been used by the Obama administration for political purposes.

headline.print_headline: Chinese Grad Student Found Beaten to Death Near USC Campus
headline.main: Chinese Grad Student Found Beaten to Death Near USC Campus

docs.snippet: A Chinese graduate student at the University of Southern California in Los Angeles has been found dead in his off-campus apartment after being assaulted late at night on his way home, police and university officials said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Chinese graduate student at the University of Southern California in Los Angeles has been found dead in his off-campus apartment after being assaulted late at night on his way home, police and university officials said.

headline.print_headline: Roswell Is Golden Girl but Kenny Settles for Silver Again
headline.main: Roswell Is Golden Girl but Kenny Settles for Silver Again

docs.snippet: Joanna Roswell added a first Commonwealth Games title to Olympic team gold with a dominant ride in the 3,000m individual pursuit on Friday but England colleague Jason Kenny had to settle for silver....
docs.lead_paragraph: Joanna Roswell added a first Commonwealth Games title to Olympic team gold with a dominant ride in the 3,000m individual pursuit on Friday but England colleague Jason Kenny had to settle for silver.

headline.main: S.E.C. Says Citigroup Unit Failed to Protect Customer Trading Data

docs.snippet: Citigroup will pay $5 million to settle charges that LavaFlow, a unit that operates an alternative stock trading venue, allowed another bank subsidiary to access customer trading data....
docs.abstract: Citigroup will pay $5 million to settle charges that LavaFlow, a unit that operates an alternative stock trading venue, allowed another bank subsidiary to access customer trading data.
